title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, 

Climate and Nature Fund Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited future ireland fund infrastructure climate nature fund act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure,
heading: 2. The 30th day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of July 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Future Ireland Fund and Infrastructure, Climate and Nature 
Fund Act 2024 (No. 16 of 2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) Parts 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5; 

(b) Part 6, other than – 

(i) 

subsections (1) and (2)(a) of section 34, 

(ii) 

section 35, and 

(iii) section 36; 

(c) Schedules 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 July, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [387] 3
